# Templates

Below are the available templates for flow cytometry panel design, cell sorter setup, and protocol authoring.

---

# Flow Cytometry & Cell Sorting Templates (Excel)

These templates provide standard configurations for designing antibody panels or recording sorter settings.

| Template | Description | Download |
|----------|-------------|----------|
| 221130_Mouse_Sony_MA900_sort_panel.xlsx | Mouse Sony MA900 sort panel template | <a class="btn btn-primary btn-sm" href="221130_Mouse_Sony_MA900_sort_panel.xlsx">Download</a> |
| ARIA_Fusion_cell_sorter.xltx | BD FACSAria Fusion cell sorter template | <a class="btn btn-primary btn-sm" href="ARIA_Fusion_cell_sorter.xltx">Download</a> |
| ARIA_III_sorter_template.xltx | BD FACSAria III sorter template | <a class="btn btn-primary btn-sm" href="ARIA_III_sorter_template.xltx">Download</a> |
| BD_FACS_CANTO_II.xltx | BD FACSCanto II acquisition template | <a class="btn btn-primary btn-sm" href="BD_FACS_CANTO_II.xltx">Download</a> |
| BD_LSR_Fortessa.xltx | BD LSRFortessa acquisition template | <a class="btn btn-primary btn-sm" href="BD_LSR_Fortessa.xltx">Download</a> |
| Cytek_Aurora_4 laser_16UV-16V-14B-8R_panel_template.xltx | Cytek Aurora 4-laser (16UV/16V/14B/8R) panel template | <a class="btn btn-primary btn-sm" href="Cytek_Aurora_4%20laser_16UV-16V-14B-8R_panel_template.xltx">Download</a> |
| Melody_sorter_template.xltx | BD FACSMelody sorter template | <a class="btn btn-primary btn-sm" href="Melody_sorter_template.xltx">Download</a> |

# Quarto Authoring Templates

These internal templates are used to generate new protocols and buffers in the Abdullah Lab protocol library.

| Template | Description | Download |
|----------|-------------|----------|
| protocol_template.qmd | Base template for new protocol `.qmd` documents | <a class="btn btn-primary btn-sm" href="protocol_template.qmd">Download</a> |
| buffer_template.qmd | Base template for new buffer `.qmd` documents | <a class="btn btn-primary btn-sm" href="buffer_template.qmd">Download</a> |
| naming_guide.qmd | Naming convention guide for files and protocols | <a class="btn btn-primary btn-sm" href="naming_guide.qmd">Download</a> |
| index.qmd | This templates index page | <a class="btn btn-primary btn-sm" href="index.qmd">Download</a> |
